column5: Location! Location! Location! Don't rent a car. Take the 100 Bus from the airport and walk 1/2 a mile to your own sweet suite! You'll have a private suite with sitting area, entertainment center, queen bed, walk-in closet, desk & chair, vanity, and tub/shower, etc. Come and go as you please. Relax on the deck. Stroll around SoCo.  Quickly walk downtown. Bike to Barton Springs. Relax by the pool. My place is perfect if you're visiting Austin for work or play!
